title: bites
directions: Place the peanuts in the bowl of a food processor and pulse until finely chopped.
Remove half of the chopped peanuts and add them to a shallow dish.
To the remaining peanuts, add the dates, cocoa powder, peanut butter, shredded coconut, salt, and water and pulse until a sticky dough forms. Add an additional tablespoon of water if necessary.
Roll the mixture into tablespoon-sized balls, then dip into the reserved chopped peanuts.
Allow energy bites to sit at room temperature for 2–4 hours.
Store in an airtight container for up to 7 days.
ingredients: 1¼ cups pitted dates, roughly chopped (about 18 to 20 dates)
